channel.title: 2006 remade help please
channel.description: in the 2006 remade source where do i change the starter items cause its not in player.java none of the item ids are in there so does anyone know and thanks ahead of time

item.title: 2006 remade help please
item.dc:creator: @EliteHackers EliteHackers
item.description:
@EliteHackers wrote:

no nothing i even spent 3 hours last night searching each file and still nothing i changed many starter items in sources but this one you just cant find the starter items and its a great source

Read full topic

item.title: 2006 remade help please
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

They must be somewhere you aren’t searching for them correctly. Perhaps check the player loading block in the login process, if the character file is not found (response code 1?) then it might add it there - since that would mean it’s a new account.

Read full topic

item.title: 2006 remade help please
item.dc:creator: @EliteHackers EliteHackers
item.description:
@EliteHackers wrote:

yeah i searched the item ids for the items that i start with and none come up anywhere thats why im so confused =/

Read full topic

item.title: 2006 remade help please
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Search for the starter item ids until you find a massive block of a method like addItem(id, amt) being called. Then just do with them as you please.

Read full topic
